channel.title: Comments on: Include A Restoration Option For The Pershing Square Design Competition

item.title: By: Russell
item.dc:creator: Russell
item.description: I remember the original park. I would stay at the Biltmore with my parents and walk through the park under the shade trees to the hotel. Later I was appalled at what had been done to the park after the garage was installed. The same thing happened to the Civic Center Park in San Francisco when a garage was installed. The lesson is that putting a garage under a park doesn't usually work out good for the park.
item.content:encoded: I remember the original park. I would stay at the Biltmore with my parents and walk through the park under the shade trees to the hotel. Later I was appalled at what had been done to the park after the garage was installed. The same thing happened to the Civic Center Park in San Francisco when a garage was installed. The lesson is that putting a garage under a park doesn’t usually work out good for the park.

item.title: By: Federico Bustamante
item.dc:creator: Federico Bustamante
item.description: John Parkinson's contributions to our magnificent city spread far and wide, including the original and majestic design for Pershig Square. Let's restore it to it's former glory!
item.content:encoded: John Parkinson’s contributions to our magnificent city spread far and wide, including the original and majestic design for Pershig Square. Let’s restore it to it’s former glory!
